description._content: Reverse of photo-postcard depicted in 2009.31 (1) front. The postcard was addressed to Mrs Mike Macdonald, Napanee, Ontario and posted in 1915. It reads: "Dear sister, just a line to say all well here. Jen has a baby boy. disapoinid? I guess[?] all dandy. We got home O.K. Baby was good as gold this is our new staiton don't laugh. I hope some day you will see more of it. I was at the ball had a grand time I saw some of napanee folk there I wish I was near you I would tell you all. Love to all from all sister, Tillie. Kiss Baby for me." The postcard was lent to the Archives by Lyle Bonner so that this image could be created and shared.
